entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as causing jubilation or fury in Harry's body.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, flying on a thestral and trying to reach Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who is still alive and fighting, as Harry can feel it.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A person whose attack on the night of Voldemort's return caused Harry's scar to hurt.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: The magical creature that Harry is riding through the darkness.

relationships.description: Voldemort's actions cause Harry to feel his emotions, making his scar hurt.
Harry can feel that Sirius is still alive and fighting.
